price: Tunajua ya kwamba yanakuhuzunisha wanayo yasema. Basi hakika wao hawakukanushi wewe, lakini hao madhaalimu wanazikataa Ishara za Mwenyezi Mungu.
arabic: قَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَحۡزُنُكَ ٱلَّذِي يَقُولُونَۖ فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Sisi tunajua kuwa yanakuhuzunisha haya wayasemayo makafiri ili kukukadhibisha. Basi wewe usihuzunike kwa hayo. Kwani hakika wao hawakutuhumu wewe kuwa ni mwongo, walakini wao kwa kujidhulumu nafsi zao na kuidhulumu haki, wanashindana kwa inda, na wanazikanya kwa ndimi zao dalili za ukweli wako, na alama za Unabii wako.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qad naʿlamu innahu layaḥzunuka alladhī yaqūlūna fa-innahum lā yukadhibūnaka walākinna al-ẓālimīna biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
